MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the CW5 postcode area of Nantwich, affecting properties in Jackson Street and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1:01pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of on site difficulties and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:34PM on 14th January 2021.
